title: miner: channel operations found blocking forever during fuzzing
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `geth version`
OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
Commit hash : 56e9001a1a8ddecc478943170b00207ef46109b9

#### Expected behaviour
The channel sending/receiving/select operation shall not block forever whatever the order of the concurrent messages.

#### Actual behaviour
We found 13 blocking issues by fuzzing the code from

https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/56e9001a1a8ddecc478943170b00207ef46109b9/miner/miner_test.go#L81

https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/56e9001a1a8ddecc478943170b00207ef46109b9/core/state/snapshot/generate.go#L748
The channel is created at
https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/56e9001a1a8ddecc478943170b00207ef46109b9/core/state/snapshot/generate.go#L166

https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/56e9001a1a8ddecc478943170b00207ef46109b9/miner/miner.go#L99-L100
